title: Strengthening Nursing Practical Competencies: Design Thinking Microlearning for Sustainable Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Concepts of Design Thinking and Fundamental Understanding of Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design sustainable development problem-solving solutions by applying the design thinking process.
Learners can develop actionable strategies to connect three or more UN SDGs (Sustainable Development Goals) to their professional field
Learners can assume the role of peer instructor by teaching concepts learned through a mobile platform

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
